projects.title: Cafe Flair
projects.Description: This Coffee Shop Ordering System is a multithreaded application to streamline daily operations, including customer orders, inventory management, employee scheduling, and sales tracking. Built with Java, it uses multithreading for tasks like order processing, inventory updates.

projects.title: Banking Transaction System
projects.Description: The Multithreaded Banking Transaction System is a Java app that simulates a real-world banking environment. It supports simultaneous transactions like deposits, withdrawals, and balance inquiries using multithreading, ensuring efficient handling and smooth operation during peak times.
